name: Laggy Discord Wedding | GMTK Game Jam 2021
name_original: Laggy Discord Wedding | GMTK Game Jam 2021
description:
You and your beloved are trying to get married on discord but issues keep getting in the way! Try to fix all of the problems befalling you two so that you guys can join together!

Use Up,Down,Left,Right,X, and Z to control the game.

Feel free to tell me about any bugs or improvements you think I could make about the game. Or you could also just tell me about how amazing it is.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
